summary: BTS Reacts : Little things they love about you  Inspired by the song ‘Little Things’ by One Direction  Summary: Your boyfriend...
body:
BTS Reacts : Little things they love about you

Inspired by the song ‘Little Things’ by One Direction

Summary: Your boyfriend always complimented you, whether it was about your outfits or how much you loved him, but you didn’t realize that when he said he loved all of you, that included the little things…

Namjoon

It was a lazy Sunday morning, you were laying in bed when you reached over to your bedside table to get your phone. When you got your phone, you felt Namjoon’s hand slide down your back until they reached the bottom of your spine.

“What do you want?”, you asked with a smile,thinking he wanted a replay of last night.

“Nothing, I just love the dimples you have at the bottom of your spine”, he said with a smile that showed his own dimples. Surprised by what he said, you gave him a small smile and turned back to your phone, blushing at the fact your boyfriend could love such a small part of you.

You let your boyfriend continue tracing your back with his index finger as he traced over your little back dimples, fascinated by them. “They’re just so cute”, you heard him say which caused you to let out a little giggle. Moments like these are what made you loved him more which you didn’t think was possible.

Jin

Jin was on tour and was away from home, which meant you missed him more than anything and would call him any chance you had. One night, when you were on the phone to Jin, you could tell that he was exhausted, as much as you hated saying goodbye to him, you knew that you had to, he needed rest more than anything.

“No jagiya, stay, talk to me, I love the sound of your voice, I miss it”, he said as he was laid in bed, heavy eyed, trying his best to stay awake.

His little comment caused a giant smile to form on your face, usually you’d make a big deal about any compliment Jin makes for you but this time you just sat there in your room, smiling to yourself as you watched your boyfriend try his best to stay awake for you. You remained on the phone to him, telling him about your day, watching him fall asleep to the sound of your voice.

Yoongi

You were getting ready for a day out with your boyfriend. He decided to take you to an amusement park for the day. There you were in your room, putting on your casual outfit when you started to struggle to get into your favourite pair of jeans. It now became a war between you and the jeans, you were determined to win. While the battle continued of you trying to squeeze into the jeans, your boyfriend walked in the room to see you struggling, letting out a small laugh.

“You’re so cute, I love the battle you have with these jeans”, he said as he looked at you with adoration, laughing at your struggle.

You gave him a small smile before finally squeezing into the jeans. Trying your best not to blush at the little compliment Yoongi gave you, you walked up to him, placing a sweet kiss on his lips.

“Let’s go”, you simply said as you walked out the room, leaving Yoongi behind,unable to see the huge smile you had on your face.

Hobi

Hobi had just come back from his tour. As soon as he stepped through the door, he dropped his bag and ran straight towards you. Picking you up, he span you around, taking in your scent which he missed.

“I missed you so much, I missed everything, including these little freckles on your cheeks which I love so much”, he said as he placed you on the ground and began placing kisses all over your face.

You stood there, taking in all the love that Hobi was giving you since you missed it so much, letting out a small giggle as he was completely in love with you. You were glad he was back home with you.

Jimin

You and your boyfriend were on an evening walk in the park, hand in hand talking about your day when you noticed Jimin started to giggle under his breathe. “What?”, you asked, amused by his sudden giggles.

“Look at your hand”, he said as he held it up next to his, letting out another giggle. “Its the perfect size for mine, it’s like your made for me”, he said as he then continued to hold your hand, squeezing it and looking at your hands interlocked with each other, loving how perfect you were for him.

After that moment, Jimin didn’t want to let go of your hand, it was perfect. No matter what you did, whether you were going to get a drink or getting a snack before watching a movie, Jimin was by your side holding your hand, it now became one of the little things about you that he loved most.

Taehyung

It was late at night and Tae had woken up to get a drink when he heard you suddenly speak. “He’s my boyfriend, I can’t just leave him to die”, you mumbled as you tossed and turned in bed. At first Tae thought you were either on the phone making a joke to someone or reading a book, non of which made sense since you weren’t awake.Forgetting about the drink, Tae stayed up and watched you sleep, listening to every word that you would speak in your sleep, silently laughing to himself.

The next day, Tae didn’t mention the conversation he heard you have in your sleep, instead he waited till you got into bed to tell you. As you said goodnight to each other, you were getting ready to go to sleep when you heard your boyfriend speak.

“Can you dry and have a cooler dream this time. One where I’m like a superhero that saves the day or a male model that you can’t get enough of ?”, he said with a smirk as he rested his head on his arm, lying on his side and raising his eyebrows to you.

“What?”, you asked, not understanding what he meant. “Well, I’ve discovered that you talk in your sleep and I think it’s adorable, I love it”, he said as he stared down at you.

Embarrassed at the fact you talk in your sleep but also blushing at the fact that he loves your little sleep conversations regardless, you agreed to try and have a better dream to amuse him then went to sleep, dreaming about how adorable your boyfriend is.

Jungkook

It was the day before your boyfriend was about to go on tour so he decided to take you out for a date at a little restaurant. You were both having a great time and then Jungkook said something to make you laugh which caused you to begin to laugh uncontrollably. While you were laughing you noticed your boyfriend took out his camera and snapped a quick photo of you.

“Why did you take a photo of me laughing ?”, you asked, “I look so ugly when I laugh”, you pouted at him as a signal for him to delete the photo, instead he just smiled and walked over to your seat, crouching down beside you.

“I think you look beautiful when you smile, you see these little creases you have by your eyes that you have when you smile, they’re my favourite because they match mine. Reminds me how perfect you are for me. I needed this photo to look at when I’m away so I can look at it and remember this moment.”, he said with a smile as he looked at you.

Overwhelmed by how amazing your boyfriend was to you, you stared back it him, putting a hand on his face and placing a kiss on his lips. The rest of the evening was spent with you and Jungkook enjoying yourselves and with you being unafraid to smile in front of him, showing him one thing that he’ll love and miss.

Anon Kookie xoxo

summary: Series: From the Shadows Part 10 You’ve known Namjoon since childhood and both mutually have passions in regards to music and...
caption:
Series: From the Shadows

Part 10

You’ve known Namjoon since childhood and both mutually have passions in regards to music and performing. While you eventually went on to become an idol, Namjoon continued college intending to fulfill his family’s desires for him to take over their company. Though focused on your own ambitions, you’ve never given up in the hope of Namjoon eventually breaking off to follow his own dreams in music and in his personal life.

Series Masterlist

If you enjoy let me know; send reactions, questions, and comments my way!

title: Clothes: JiKook Version
body:
Jungkook rolled out of bed, running his hands over his face. He walked over to his dresser to grab clothes before practice. He pulled on a pair of grey sweats before going to grab a tee shirt.

He pulled on his shoes before grabbing something quick from the kitchen. He took a bite of his food as he pulled the door closed behind him.

Walking into the practice room he didn’t take notice in any of his hyungs as he sat down his water and started to stretch.

It wasn’t until they got a break that he walked over to Jimin and Tae. He leaned on Tae’s shoulder, still panting from the rough practice. Once he caught his breath, he glanced at the two, doing a double take at his tiny hyung.

“Jiminie?” Jungkook asked, separating from Tae. “Who’s shirt is that?”

Jimin looked down at his shirt, a white one that was a couple sizes too big for his small frame.

“Um.. I don’t know. I just found it and threw it on before practice.”

“Really, hyung? That’s what you’re going with?” Jungkook gave him a look, causing Jimin to take a step back, eyes looking everywhere except the boy in front of him.

Just before Jungkook could do anything else, Hobi called for the three so they could continue practice.

***

Once they all were back in the dorm, Jimin hurried to the safety of his bedroom. It wasn’t two minutes later that he heard the door open, he looked up from his spot on his bed to see the younger closing the door and stalking closer like Jimin was his prey.

Jimin tried to move further back on his bed before Jungkook grabbed him. He pulled the smaller closer to him as he climbed onto the bed. He hovered over Jimin, meeting his eyes, “What have I told you about stealing my clothes, hyung?”

Jimin felt heat spreading through his cheeks, he tried to look away, but the younger grabbed the side of his face, forcing his to maintain eye contact. He let out a small, pathetic whimper as he squirmed under Jungkook.

“What did I say, hyung?” Jimin felt like melting when the deep, raspy words left the younger’s lips, he shut his eyes tight, “To not let the, the other’s see m-me when I wear you-your clothes.” He stuttered, the words were airy, Jimin felt breathless.

“And why is that?” Jungkook leaned closer so Jimin could feel his breath on his neck, could feel the younger’s lips as they traced patters over his skin.

“Becau-beacuse-” Jimin’s words die on his lips when Jungkook bites down on his neck, tongue laving over the teeth indentions. Jimin’s breath hitches as he grabs at the fabric of Jungkook’s shirt. He can feel the younger’s hands moving under his own shirt, “Ko-Kookie.” He tries to grab the others attention, but the sounds come out as breathy moans.

“Something wrong, hyung?” He could hear the smirk in Jungkook’s voice, he could feel his hands inching higher on his body, bringing the fabric up along with them.

Jimin let’s his head fall back onto the pillow below him, moving his hands to play in the younger’s soft locks. He let himself enjoy the feel of Jungkook’s hands on his body until he felt the tug of the shirt being pulled over his head. He raised up, letting Jungkook take off the shirt. He leaned forward to kiss the younger, only to have Jungkook step off the bed. He looked at the younger with a mix of confusion and hurt.

Jungkook raised the shirt in his hand as if that was the explanation, “I warned you about wearing my clothes in front of the hyungs. Now enjoy your punishment, hyung.” He smirked leaving his tiny hyung, shirtless on his bed, eyes wide in shock as they followed the tall figure walking out of the room.

Cross posted on: https://www.wattpad.com/user/Mental_Illustrations

summary:

Jimin:
“Y/N?” Jimin whispered, poking his head through the door. He hoped you weren’t...
body:
bangtan reaction || seeing your scars (A) [Maknae Line] {Trigger Warning}

it’s really obvious who my bias is isnt it

Jimin:

“Y/N?” Jimin whispered, poking his head through the door. He hoped you weren’t asleep yet; his thoughts had woken him up in the middle of the night and he felt the need to talk about it.

“Hey, what are you doing up?” You asked, sitting further up against the headboard.

“I wanna ask you something.”

-

“Are you sure it’s not because of me?”

“Yes, for the fourth time, I promise that it’s not because of you.”

You held Jimin’s hand in yours and sat opposite him on the bed. He had seen your scars many times and tried to refrain from asking you about it, but now that it was effecting him too he knew he needed to say something.

“It’s everything—school, work; anxiety.”

Jimin looked down at your hands and sighed, seemingly not believing it.

“Jimin,” you said, cupping his face in your hands. He gave you his soft puppy gaze and the pout on his lip made your heart melt.

“I promise.” You stroked his cheek with your thumb. “If anything, you’re keeping me from doing it. You mean everything to me love. You really think you did something to cause this?”

He looked at you and shook his head as you pushed a piece of hair from his face.

“You promise?” You asked.

“I promise,” he smiled. “Will you try not to do it anymore?”

“I‘ll try my hardest,” you kissed the pout on his lips away.

“Love you,” he whispered.

“Love you too, Jiminie.”

Taehyung:

Your stomach hurt like hell and your lungs were on fire, but you wouldn’t have it any other way.

“Taehyung, stop!” You laughed, effortlessly reaching out in an attempt to pry his hands away from your sides. The sound of his laugh was like music to you ears as he tickled you, hands scampering all around your sides and leaving you breathless.

“What’s the magic word?” He said, stopping his hands for a moment.

“P-please!” You yelled. Finally he stopped and fell down on top of you, making you grunt.

“Can’t breathe,” you muttered, still trying to catch your breath.

He rolled off of you and to the side, turning to face you and tuck a piece of hair behind your ear. You stared into each other’s eyes for a moment and his deep gaze made your heart flutter.

“You know I’ve seen them, right?”

“What?” You asked, suddenly confused.

He reached down and grabbed your arms, rubbing a thumb over your exposed wrists.

“I’ve seen them before, Y/N,” he said softly. “Why didn’t you tell me?”

You looked down at his chest and swallowed hard.

“I’m sorry..” You whispered. He leaned forward and kissed your forehead.

“Don’t apologize. Just don’t hide things like that from me, alright? I’m your boyfriend.”

You nodded your head and squeezed his hand, giving him a smile that made him melt.

Jungkook:

Jungkook had seen your scars on multiple occasions before. At first he thought he should console you, but decided against it when you seemed perfectly happy then next day. Time went on and they faded, but more only grew back in their place and you still had yet to tell him. He was done waiting. He wanted answers.

“Why haven’t you told me?” He asked you one day during a movie in the living room.

“What?” You paused the movie and looked at him.

“Your wrists,” he said, avoiding eye contact with you. “Why haven’t you told me about them?”

You remained speechless, searching his face for answers or something to say, but they didn’t come.

“It’s been over a year now, Y/N. I thought I meant everything to you. Why don’t you tell me things?”

“You do mean everything to me, Kook. I just-“

“No,” he snapped, the anger in his voice suddenly very present. “Clearly I don’t. How many have you told before me? How many other people know? Am I the last one you’ve told?”

“No one knows, Jungkook,” you retorded with an angry tone in your voice as well. “You think I wouldn’t tell you first?”

“Well it fucking feels like it!”

The room fell silent.

Then there was the small sound of your crying.

Covering your mouth with your hand, you shut your eyes and turned away from him, standing up off the couch to go to your room.

“Wait, Y/N I didn’t mean-“

You stopped in your tracks, his sentence fading from his lips as you did.

“I know you d-didn’t mean it,” you wiped your eyes. “You don’t mean a lot of things you say. But I’ve tried so hard to tell you, and so many times, but I just can’t do it. I don’t want to see the look on your face when I tell you, I don’t want you to be disappointed in me.”

Jungkook stood off the couch and walked over to you.

“Let me finish, Jungkook.”

“No,” he said, grabbing both your hands and kissing your palms. “I’m sorry.”

“I’m the one that’s supposed to be-“

He cut you off with a small, soft kiss on the lips.

“I’m sorry,” he whispered.

“Me too.”

He cut you off with a small, soft kiss on the lips.

“I’m sorry,” he whispered.

trail.content_raw:
bangtan reaction || seeing your scars (A) [Maknae Line] {Trigger Warning}

it’s really obvious who my bias is isnt it

Jimin:

“Y/N?” Jimin whispered, poking his head through the door. He hoped you weren’t asleep yet; his thoughts had woken him up in the middle of the night and he felt the need to talk about it.

“Hey, what are you doing up?” You asked, sitting further up against the headboard.

“I wanna ask you something.”

-

“Are you sure it’s not because of me?”

“Yes, for the fourth time, I promise that it’s not because of you.”

You held Jimin’s hand in yours and sat opposite him on the bed. He had seen your scars many times and tried to refrain from asking you about it, but now that it was effecting him too he knew he needed to say something.

“It’s everything—school, work; anxiety.”

Jimin looked down at your hands and sighed, seemingly not believing it.

“Jimin,” you said, cupping his face in your hands. He gave you his soft puppy gaze and the pout on his lip made your heart melt.

“I promise.” You stroked his cheek with your thumb. “If anything, you’re keeping me from doing it. You mean everything to me love. You really think you did something to cause this?”

He looked at you and shook his head as you pushed a piece of hair from his face.

“You promise?” You asked.

“I promise,” he smiled. “Will you try not to do it anymore?”

“I‘ll try my hardest,” you kissed the pout on his lips away.

“Love you,” he whispered.

“Love you too, Jiminie.”

Taehyung:

Your stomach hurt like hell and your lungs were on fire, but you wouldn’t have it any other way.

“Taehyung, stop!” You laughed, effortlessly reaching out in an attempt to pry his hands away from your sides. The sound of his laugh was like music to you ears as he tickled you, hands scampering all around your sides and leaving you breathless.

“What’s the magic word?” He said, stopping his hands for a moment.

“P-please!” You yelled. Finally he stopped and fell down on top of you, making you grunt.

“Can’t breathe,” you muttered, still trying to catch your breath.

He rolled off of you and to the side, turning to face you and tuck a piece of hair behind your ear. You stared into each other’s eyes for a moment and his deep gaze made your heart flutter.

“You know I’ve seen them, right?”

“What?” You asked, suddenly confused.

He reached down and grabbed your arms, rubbing a thumb over your exposed wrists.

“I’ve seen them before, Y/N,” he said softly. “Why didn’t you tell me?”

You looked down at his chest and swallowed hard.

“I’m sorry..” You whispered. He leaned forward and kissed your forehead.

“Don’t apologize. Just don’t hide things like that from me, alright? I’m your boyfriend.”

You nodded your head and squeezed his hand, giving him a smile that made him melt.

Jungkook:

Jungkook had seen your scars on multiple occasions before. At first he thought he should console you, but decided against it when you seemed perfectly happy then next day. Time went on and they faded, but more only grew back in their place and you still had yet to tell him. He was done waiting. He wanted answers.

“Why haven’t you told me?” He asked you one day during a movie in the living room.

“What?” You paused the movie and looked at him.

“Your wrists,” he said, avoiding eye contact with you. “Why haven’t you told me about them?”

You remained speechless, searching his face for answers or something to say, but they didn’t come.

“It’s been over a year now, Y/N. I thought I meant everything to you. Why don’t you tell me things?”

“You do mean everything to me, Kook. I just-“

“No,” he snapped, the anger in his voice suddenly very present. “Clearly I don’t. How many have you told before me? How many other people know? Am I the last one you’ve told?”

“No one knows, Jungkook,” you retorded with an angry tone in your voice as well. “You think I wouldn’t tell you first?”

“Well it fucking feels like it!”

The room fell silent.

Then there was the small sound of your crying.

Covering your mouth with your hand, you shut your eyes and turned away from him, standing up off the couch to go to your room.

“Wait, Y/N I didn’t mean-“

You stopped in your tracks, his sentence fading from his lips as you did.

“I know you d-didn’t mean it,” you wiped your eyes. “You don’t mean a lot of things you say. But I’ve tried so hard to tell you, and so many times, but I just can’t do it. I don’t want to see the look on your face when I tell you, I don’t want you to be disappointed in me.”

Jungkook stood off the couch and walked over to you.

“Let me finish, Jungkook.”

“No,” he said, grabbing both your hands and kissing your palms. “I’m sorry.”

“I’m the one that’s supposed to be-“

He cut you off with a small, soft kiss on the lips.

“I’m sorry,” he whispered.

“Me too.”

body:
Author Recommendation: thedarkerstdawn

  • even the stars burn (some even fall to the earth)

Taehyung is already dying when Yoongi falls in love with him.

  • everything that’s broke (leave it to the breeze)

Taehyung knows that his relationship is broken, because his boyfriend is barely ever home and when he is he smells like some stranger. He just can’t bring himself to let go.

Then he meets someone who makes him feel brand new.

  • if a heart is always searching (can it ever find a home)

Prince Taehyung has always known his marriage would be arranged.

He just never expected it to be so soon or to Prince Yoongi of Daegu, who has a past as dark as the castle he calls home.

  • Wonderstruck

In which Taehyung drinks a love potion and falls for Yoongi.

(It doesn’t take a love potion for Yoongi to fall for Taehyung)

  • you are everything that i dreamed of (now i can paint a picture)

the “you work in a strip club and gave me the best lapdance of my life and now you’re my new neighbour” au

  • you’re my mortal flaw (and i’m your fatal sin)

Taehyung sells his soul for his brother’s life.

The demon he gives it to is Yoongi.
